=== Installation ===

Install GnomePpp package (gnome-ppp):

<pre>
sudo apt-get install gnome-ppp 
</pre>

=== Configuration ===

Open it in Menu => Internet => Gnome-PPP

Huawei E220 may be detected in '''/dev/ttyUSB0'''

Type of modem: USB-Modem 

3774000 . 

** Telephon : TONE 

** Telephon number: *99# 

** Initialization string : at+cgdcont=1,"IP","Internet" 

* Options: 

** Desktop integration ACTIVE 
** Ignore Terminal strings ACTIVE 
** All other options: DEACTIVATED
